oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of chicory root and age on the gastrointestinal ecosystem and accumulation of skatole and androstenone in back-fat of male and female pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jensen, Bent Borg
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Crop combinations and interactions
Breeding, genetics and propagation
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 72 pigs were fed standard diet supplemented with 25% dried chicory root. The pigs were slaughtered at three live weight, 62,98 and 118.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jensen, Bent Borg (2015) Effect of chicory root and age on the gastrointestinal ecosystem and accumulation of skatole and androstenone in back-fat of male and female pigs. In: Book of Abstracts: Digestive Physiology of Pigs 2015, Book of Abstracts: Digestive Physiology 2015. [Submitted]
